heading: Dedicated Teams
content: Personalised teaching, in a one-to-one ratio, to each child's individual challenges and needs, and takes into consideration the whole child.

heading: Tailored to students
content: Integrates several subject areas (eg. English and Literature/Geography) and bridges to standardised exams (PSLE, 'N/O' levels, iGCSEs).

heading: Highly Professional
content: Developed by an educational therapist trained in the field of Specific Learning Difficulties, with extensive experience in the field, both as teacher and teacher trainer.

heading: Singapore Specific
content: Takes into account the unique challenges posed by Singaporean culture, language development and school curriculum.

heading: Targeted help
content: Focuses on building strategies and fundamental concepts, for children from N2 to Sec 4, particularly those with mild to moderate learning difficulties.

heading: Proprietary solutions
content: Extends to secondary levels for Math, Science, English, Literature, and Geography, supported by our small but dedicated, hand-picked team.
